post.body: It doesn't help my test if you @ him. :-)
With your search, that's all you can find? 140,000 Alltop tweets, and that's it?
We're sure going to see if Comcastcares really monitors Twitter! This will be interesting.
Both sides opted in: followers and Twitterfeed users. How can this be called spam? http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E-mail_spam
Because I want to see if they are following my blog advice: #4 http://is.gd/9Y3S
how about PBS with Telethons. And there is no spam in my tweets. You opted in to follow.
Not so suck up or anything, but Comcast has been the Triple Crown for me: internet, video, and landlines.
Today the fax machine worked! Just tweeting about you fixed it, I swear!
To follow or not follow, that is the question. What is nobler?
thanks! appreciate the help
Better theory: only read this: http://tinyurl.com/59n2yf
On ice. :-) Actually, Ice Oasis in Redwood City and Ice Center in San Mateo and Iceland in Belmont
Product reviews are likely at http://gadgets.alltop.com/. Not sure about the giveaways stuff.
We do have http://deals.alltop.com/
YGGT :-)
Now that is funny.
I sure would like to mass delete them. DM Whacker doesn't work. I can't see a way to delete.
This is what we do at Alltop: http://alltop.com/
Then you made the right decision. :-)
You have ten minutes to get to Frankfurt. :-)
First stop in Moscow: hockey store to buy jerseys! :-)
For a spammer, I sure get retweeted a lot: http://tinyurl.com/59n2yf You did the right thing to UFM.
It's not 3pm Pacific yet! :-)
No, I'm on Luf 458
Sure, please give us info here: http://tinyurl.com/5kvsd6
What city are you in? I'm in Moscow now. Be in Munich in a few hours. Then on to SFO.
Good view of what people like about me is here: http://tinyurl.com/59n2yf
Think of me as PBS: there's always a telethon about to happen. :-)
UFM, baby, UFM :-)
And you thought all I was is a Alltop spammer, huh? :-)
Yup, just like Google is just a search engine. :-)
Pronounced "uff um" it's stands for Un Follow Me as in "If you think my tweets are spam, just uff um instead of femaledogging"
She's doing this: https://twitterfeed.com/alltop
U mean like this? http://teen.alltop.com/ Just go to http://alltop.com/ and search for anything! Worldwide domination is the goal
There are no sub topics within a topic so where is the messinees? Thanks
I don't understand. Is tech itself messy? Why does having 400 topics make tech messy? Tech itself is the same.
Glad that you like it. Please do this when you see a topic that you like: http://snipr.com/6lzzy
You mean like http://health.alltop.com/ and http://fitness.alltop.com/ ?
= 2? Are you an investment banker or mortgage broker?
It's not that much thicker. Beats the hell out of running out of juice. I never use a holster. That's way to geeky for me.
Reality Check mostly, I think.
My best to you and yours too!'
Extremely well. I am very happy with Adjix.
You should run a social survey for a question like this. Check out socialtoo.com to do it.
Sorry, probably can't help you with that. Google is better for that type of search
at least once every 28 days
Thanks for following for a while.
Were your expectations big?
So I was good? :-)
Beats going to Alaska in January.
When it comes to my book, Reality is a fantasy
